intro: Polyalthia motleyana var. glabrescens, commonly known as the smooth-leaved polyalthia, is a tropical evergreen tree native to Southeast Asia. Due to its ornamental value and ecological importance, it is occasionally cultivated in botanical gardens and conservation programs.
